headline: Truist receives 'Outstanding' Community Reinvestment Act rating
summary: Truist Financial Corporation (NYSE: TFC) today announced it received the highest possible overall rating of "Outstanding" from the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation for its most recent Community Reinvestment Act examination period, from 2020-2022. The CRA encourages banks to help meet the credit needs of communities in which they operate, including low- and moderate-income (LMI) neighborhoods, consistent with safe and sound banking operations.
